lst.name: sentence
lst.str: On May 5, COMEX eliminated price limits on the two contracts following each spot delivery in gold, silver, copper and aluminum futures after a review of its clearing operations, which were severely tested by a volatile market in silver futures at the end of April.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Paul Cain, a vice president at Shearson Lehman Brothers, said the elimination of price limits will cut back on panic buying or selling and contribute to more orderly markets.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: During the last week of April, silver futures often traded at the daily allowable limit amid concerns about inflation, the dollar, and other factors.
